Translations.Text: nahim, nahim dura ane ghanum ja dura che te, jenum tamane vacana apavamam ave che
(jivana) to phakta duniyanum jivana che, apane mrtyu pami'e chi'e ane jivita tha'i'e chi'e. Ane evum nathi ke apane pacha jivita karavamam avisum
a to basa! Evo vyakti che, jene allaha para juthanum bandhyum, ame to a vyakti para imana lavavana nathi
payagambare du'a kari ke palanahara! A lokona juthalavava para tum mari madada kara
javaba apyo ke a loko to najika manja potana karmo para dilagiri vyakta karase
chevate n'yaya pramane cise (daramana avaje) temane pakadi lidha ane ame te lokone asta-vyasta kari nakhya, basa! Atyacari'o mate duri che
tyara pachi ame biji ghani komonum sarjana karyum
na to ko'i koma potana samayathi agala vadhi ane na to pachala rahi ga'i

pachi ame eka-pachi eka payagambarone avatarita karata rahya, jyare pana je koma pase temana payagambara avya, temane juthalavya, basa! Ame ekane bija pachala lagavi didha ane te lokone navalakatha banavi didha. Te loko mate duri che, je'o imana nathi lavata
Pachi ame musa a.Sa. Ane temana bha'i haruna a.Sa.Ne potani ayato ane spasta purava sathe avatarita karya
phira'auna ane tena laskaro tarapha, basa! Te loko'e ghamanda karyum ane te loko vidrohi ja hatam
kaheva lagya ke sum ame apana jeva be vyakti'o para imana lavi'e? Jo ke temani koma pote (pana) amari dekharekha hethala che
basa! Te loko'e te bannene juthalavya, chevate te loko pana nasta thayela'o manthi tha'i gaya
ame musa a.Sa.Ne kitaba pana api, jethi loko satya marga para avi jaya
ame marayamana dikara ane teni matane eka nisani banavya ane te bannene ucca, svaccha ane raheva layaka, ane vaheta panivali jagya para sarana apyum
he payagambaro! Halala vastu kha'o ane satkarya karo, tame je kami pana kari rahya cho tene hum sari rite janum chum
ni:Sanka a tamaro dina eka ja dina che ane hum ja tamara sauno palanahara chum, basa! Tame marathi darata raho
pachi te loko'e pote (ja) potana adesa (dina)na andaro'andara tukade tukada kari didha, dareka jutha je kami temani pase che, tena para ja itara'i rahyo che
basa! Tame (pana) temane vidroha mate thodoka samaya api do
sum a loko ema samaji betha che ke ame je kami pana temanum dhana ane santanamam vadharo kari rahya che, (te temane phayado pahoncadase)
te'o potana mate bhala'i'omam utavala kari rahya che, (nahim) parantu a loko samajata ja nathi
ni:Sanka je loko potana palanaharana gus'sathi dare che
ane je potana palanaharani ayato para imana dharave che
ane je loko potana palanahara sathe ko'ine bhagidara nathi banavata
ane je loko ape che ane je kami pana ape che ane te lokona hrdaya kampe che ke te'o potana palanahara tarapha pacha pharavana che
A ja te loko che, je'o jhadapathi phayado prapta kari rahya che ane a ja te loko che, je teni tarapha dode che
ame ko'i jivane teni takata karata vadhare takalipha nathi apata ane mari pase evi kitaba che je satya vata kare che, temana para saheja pana atyacara karavamam nahim ave
parantu temana hrdaya a vise bedarakara che ane temana mate a sivaya pana ghana karyo che, jemane te'o karavavala che
tyam sudhi ke ame temana sukhi lokone yatanamam pakadi lidha, to te bhagadoda karava lagya
aje na bhago, kharekhara amari virud'dha tamari madada karavamam nahim ave
mari ayato to tamari samaksa padhavamam avati hati, to pana tame potani edi para undha bhagata hatam
ghammada karata, navalakatha kaheta, tene chodi deta hatam
sum te loko'e e vata vise na vicaryum? Parantu temani pase te vastu avi, je temana purvajo pase nahati avi
athava, te loko'e potana payagambarane na olakhya, ke tena inkara karanara bani betha che
athava a loko kahe che ke pagala che? Parantu te to temana mate satya lavya che, ham! Temana manthi vadhare padata loko satya vatathi cidaya che

jo satya ja temani maneccha'one adhina tha'i jaya, to dharati ane akasa ane teni vacceni dareka vastu asta-vyasta tha'i jaya, satya to e che ke ame temane temana mate sikhamana pahoncadi didhi, parantu te'o potani sikhamana thi modhum pheravanara che
sum tame temani pasethi ko'i mahenatanum iccho cho? Yada rakho ke tamara palanaharanum mahenatanum ghanum ja uttama che ane te badha karata uttama roji apanara che
ni:Sanka tame to temane satya marga tarapha bolavo cho
ni:Sanka je loko akherata para imana nathi dharavata te satya margathi hati janara che
